sentences.english: But many do mislead (men) by their appetites unchecked by knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 有許多人，必因自己的私慾，而無知地使別人迷誤。

sentences.english: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 真主使誰迷誤，在真主的棄絕後，誰沒有任何保護者。

sentences.english: And those whom Allah leaves to stray, no one can guide.
sentences.chinese: 真主使誰迷誤，誰就沒有嚮導。

sentences.english: Truly those in sin are the ones straying in mind, and mad.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪者的確在迷誤和烈火中。

sentences.english: It also had unavoidable mistakes and defects.
sentences.chinese: 也有當時難以避免的迷誤和不足。

sentences.english: The materialists start off from objects, and from this, would fall into "placing importance on the outside world".
sentences.chinese: 唯物主義者從客體出發，從而陷入了“法執”的迷誤。
